ygData.msgSnippet: Okay this is my first post guys so if you dont like it give me creative feedback to help me get used to this thanks. Millions of stars sorround the universe,

Okay this is my first post guys so if you dont like it give me creative
feedback to help me get used to this thanks.




Millions of stars sorround the universe, billions of civilizations living
in millions of planets are oblivious to the strugle going on in one
particular galaxy for the fate of the universe. In a sector of what we know
as the milky way in the past there is a planet ravaged by a war and still
to be ravaged in the future. Filled with countless life, oceans, and land
masses a small planet could forever change the future. In all its natural
glory the badlands of this planet earth has a scaring remain of the first
battle, a space cruiser of sorts sticks out of this land as it dosent
belong, the predacon shuttle stolen by a band of renegade predacons. As we
zoom in we see it has not been used in a while and all but abandond, almost.

A fimiliar hum emits from the wreckage underneath the dry molten rock. In a
melodic form a voice unheard speaks.


"Stored enough energy for emergency frequency. Initiating" at that the
melodical voice stops and begins to radio any cybertronian frequency.

"Emergency, cybertronian unit off line, in need of assistance" beams the
computer. "In need of assistance, head to these coordinates imidiatly....."
As the unheard noise go's offline everything returns to normal, as it
should be.
